title: Build GreenLeaf animated e-commerce plant store interface

requirements.text: Create home page with full-screen animated hero section featuring cinematic plant visuals, slow floating animation on plants/leaves, smooth fade and slide text animation, subtle background gradient movement, and scroll indicator animation

quotes: Hero Section: Full-screen hero with cinematic plant visuals, Slow floating animation on plants/leaves, Text appearing with smooth fade and slide animation, Subtle background gradient movement, Scroll indicator animation

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section takes up full viewport height
Plant/leaf images have continuous floating animation
Text elements fade in and slide up on page load
Background gradient subtly shifts colors
Animated scroll indicator prompts user to scroll down

requirements.text: Add featured categories section with hover animations where cards lift slightly on hover, implement image zoom with soft shadow expansion, and include smooth hover transitions on buttons

quotes: Product cards lift slightly on hover, Image zoom + soft shadow expansion, Buttons with liquid smooth hover transitions

acceptanceCriteria: Category cards have subtle lift transform on hover
Images zoom smoothly when hovered
Shadow expands softly around hovered cards
Button hover states are liquid smooth with no jarring transitions

requirements.text: Implement best-selling plants carousel with smooth sliding transitions and navigation controls
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel slides smoothly between products
Previous/next navigation controls work correctly
Carousel is touch-enabled on mobile devices
Auto-play option works with smooth transitions

requirements.text: Create benefits section with animated icons that trigger on scroll into view
acceptanceCriteria: Icons animate when scrolled into viewport
Animations are smooth and purposeful
Benefits are displayed in a clean grid layout
Text appears with staggered timing after icons

requirements.text: Add testimonials section with automatic sliding carousel animation
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials auto-slide at regular intervals
Sliding animation is smooth and seamless
Users can manually navigate testimonials
Pause on hover functionality works

requirements.text: Create newsletter signup section with soft motion effects and input animations
acceptanceCriteria: Input field has smooth focus transitions
Submit button has hover animation
Section has subtle entrance animation on scroll
Form elements have elegant motion design

requirements.text: Build shop page with animated product grid that reveals items with fade and upward motion on scroll, using staggered timing for sequential appearance

quotes: Elements reveal with fade + upward motion on scroll

acceptanceCriteria: Products fade in and slide up when scrolled into view
Grid items animate with staggered delays for cascade effect
Animation triggers only once per scroll session
Grid is responsive across all screen sizes

requirements.text: Add filter sidebar with sliding interaction that smoothly expands and collapses, including animated filter selection with visual feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar slides in/out smoothly
Filter options highlight smoothly when selected

Mobile filter menu works with drawer animation

requirements.text: Implement hover preview effects on product cards with image zoom and shadow expansion
acceptanceCriteria: Product images zoom on hover
Shadow smoothly expands around card
Quick info appears on hover
Hover state is smooth and performant

requirements.text: Add smooth pagination transitions between product pages
acceptanceCriteria: Page changes have fade or slide transition

acceptanceCriteria: Image gallery transitions smoothly between photos
Thumbnail navigation works with smooth selection
Care indicator icons animate on page load or scroll
Accordion sections expand/collapse smoothly
Related products carousel slides smoothly

acceptanceCriteria: Blog entries animate in as user scrolls
Progress bar remains sticky at top while scrolling

acceptanceCriteria: Cart drawer slides in smoothly from side
Add-to-cart shows item flying to cart icon
Quantity controls update with smooth transitions

requirements.text: Create checkout page interface with smooth form transitions and validation animations
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form has smooth step transitions

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar remains sticky at top of page
Background blurs when scrolling down
Active menu item has animated underline indicator
Mobile menu opens with fullscreen smooth animation
Navbar is fully responsive

requirements.text: Implement smooth inertia scrolling throughout the site with parallax scrolling between sections where plants float slightly while scrolling and sections transition seamlessly without hard cuts

quotes: Smooth inertia scrolling, Parallax scrolling between sections, Plants slightly floating while scrolling, Sections transition seamlessly (no hard cuts)

acceptanceCriteria: Scrolling has natural inertia feel
Background and foreground elements move at different speeds for parallax effect
Plant images have subtle floating animation during scroll

Performance remains smooth during scrolling

requirements.text: Add wishlist heart animation with smooth toggle interaction that responds to user clicks
acceptanceCriteria: Heart icon animates smoothly when clicked
Filled and unfilled states transition smoothly
Animation has a bouncy, delightful feel
Wishlist state is stored in browser

requirements.text: Implement button ripple or glow effect on interaction for all primary action buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons show ripple effect on click
Glow effect appears smoothly on hover
Effect is subtle and premium feeling

requirements.text: Add smooth dropdown expansion animations for all dropdown menus and select controls
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdowns expand with smooth height transition
Options fade in with staggered timing
Close animation is equally smooth
Dropdown is accessible via keyboard

requirements.text: Implement smooth page-to-page transitions using fade or slide effects between route changes

quotes: Seamless navigation without abrupt reload feeling

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation between pages has smooth transition
No abrupt white flash or jarring reload
Exit and enter animations coordinate smoothly
Browser back/forward buttons respect transitions

requirements.text: Create loading animation using leaf or growing plant concept that appears during page transitions or data loading

quotes: Loading animation using leaf or growing plant concept

acceptanceCriteria: Loading indicator features organic plant/leaf animation
Animation loops smoothly
Appears during navigation and async operations
Design matches overall aesthetic

requirements.text: Apply minimal luxury eco aesthetic with soft green and earthy tones, beige backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, soft shadows, clean grid system with large breathing space, and Apple-quality polish combined with organic natural motion

quotes: Minimal + luxury eco aesthetic, Soft green, earthy tones, beige backgrounds, Glassmorphism and soft shadows, Clean grid system with large breathing space, Apple-quality polish combined with organic natural motion

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft greens, earth tones, and beige
UI elements have glassmorphism effect with blur and transparency
Shadows are soft and subtle throughout
Grid layouts have generous whitespace
Overall feel is premium, calm, and organic
Design quality matches Apple-level polish

requirements.text: Create static product data with example plants including names, descriptions, prices, images, care requirements (water, sunlight levels), categories, and availability status

quotes: Static product data (hardcoded example plants in the code)

acceptanceCriteria: At least 12-15 example plants are included
Each plant has complete product information
Data structure is clean and easily editable
Images are organized and properly referenced
Multiple categories represented

requirements.text: Implement frontend-only shopping cart using browser storage (localStorage) that persists cart items, quantities, and total calculations without backend integration

quotes: Shopping cart functionality (add/remove items, stored in browser)

acceptanceCriteria: Cart data persists in browser between sessions
Add, remove, and update quantity functions work correctly
Cart total calculates accurately
Cart icon shows item count badge
Cart syncs across browser tabs

requirements.text: Ensure all animations feel smooth, lightweight, and premium while maintaining fast loading performance and avoiding excessive motion that could harm usability

quotes: Animations must feel smooth, lightweight, and premium, Avoid excessive motion; prioritize elegance and usability, Maintain fast loading performance

acceptanceCriteria: Page load time is under 3 seconds
Animations run at 60fps without jank
Motion is purposeful and not overwhelming
Users can navigate without distraction
Performance is optimized for smooth experience

requirements.text: Make website fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop with appropriate breakpoints and mobile-optimized interactions
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts smoothly to all screen sizes
Touch interactions work on mobile devices
Mobile navigation is intuitive and animated
Typography scales appropriately
Images are optimized for different viewports

constraints: Do not create any backend functionality or database integration
Do not implement user authentication or account system
All product data must be static and hardcoded in frontend
Cart functionality must use browser localStorage only
Maintain smooth 60fps performance for all animations
Do not use blue and purple color schemes unless specifically requested
nonGoals: Building admin panel for product management
Implementing user authentication with Internet Identity
Creating backend API for product data
Creating user accounts or order history tracking
